Projects

Here are some of my key open-source projects that showcase my work in infrastructure automation and observability.

terraform-provider-mimir

This terraform provider allows you to interact with grafana mimir.

Go
terraform grafana-mimir terraform-provider
View on GitHub

terraform-provider-loki

This terraform provider allows you to interact with grafana loki.

Go
terraform grafana-loki terraform-provider
View on GitHub

acme-manager

Manage acme certificates and store them to vault

Go
acme vault certificates
View on GitHub

sshot

Lightweight ansible in GO.

Go
ansible golang automation
View on GitHub

foreman_exporter

A Prometheus exporter that exposes Foreman metrics with caching and high availability support.

Go
prometheus foreman exporter monitoring
View on GitHub

slam

Send alertmanager alerts notifications to slack without creating webhook url for each slack channel.

Go
alertmanager slack notifications
View on GitHub

promk

Prometheus Keepalive Agent - sends an up metric to a Prometheus remote-write endpoint at regular intervals.

Go
prometheus monitoring keepalive
View on GitHub

sectigo-client

An (unofficial) client for the sectigo Web-API.

Go
sectigo api-client certificates
View on GitHub
